mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, RTRIM(DEVICE_NM) || '-' || RTRIM(DEVICE_ALIAS) ||' [' || TRIM(DEVICE_ID) || ']' AS DEVICE, LINE_CD, TOTAL, (OK - REPAIR) AS OK, NG, NOSCAN, PASS, REPAIR, OK AS TOT_OK, TOT_NG, DECODE(TOTAL-PASS, 0, 0, TRUNC((OK) / (TOTAL - PASS) * 100, 2)) AS PASS_RATIO FROM ( SELECT T.PLANT_CD, T.DEVICE_ID, T.DEVICE_SERIAL, T.DEVICE_NM, T.DEVICE_ALIAS, B.CODE_NM AS LINE_CD, NVL(A.TOTAL_CNT, 0) AS TOTAL, NVL(A.OK_CNT, 0) AS OK, NVL(A.NG_CNT, 0) AS NG, NVL(A.PASS_CNT, 0) AS PASS, NVL(A.REPAIR_CNT, 0) AS REPAIR, NVL(A. NOSCAN_CNT, 0) AS NOSCAN, NVL((A.NG_CNT + A.NOSCAN_CNT), 0) AS TOT_NG FROM TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA T INNER JOIN C_COMM_CD B ON B.PLANT_CD = T.PLANT_CD AND B.CD_GRP = 'LINE_CD' AND B.CODE = T.LINE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PLANT_CD, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, WORK_DT, SUM(NVL(TOTAL_CNT, 0)) AS TOTAL_CNT, SUM(NVL(OK_CNT, 0)) AS OK_CNT, SUM(NVL(NG_CNT, 0)) AS NG_CNT, SUM(NVL(PASS_CNT, 0)) AS PASS_CNT, SUM(NVL(REPAIR_CNT, 0)) AS REPAIR_CNT, SUM(NVL(NOSCAN_CNT, 0)) AS NOSCAN_CNT FROM TIGHTENING_SUM_HI WHERE (#{shift} = '-1' OR SHIFT = #{shift}) GROUP BY PLANT_CD, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, WORK_DT ) A ON A.PLANT_CD = T.PLANT_CD AND A.DEVICE_ID = T.DEVICE_ID AND A.DEVICE_SERIAL = T.DEVICE_SERIAL AND A.WORK_DT = #{work_dt} WHERE T.PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},4) AND (#{device_id} = '-1' OR T.DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR T.DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND T.STN_GUB = 'N' AND (#{line_cd} = '-1' OR T.LINE_CD = #{line_cd}) ORDER BY T.PLANT_CD, CASE T.LINE_CD WHEN 'T1' THEN 1 WHEN 'T2' THEN 2 WHEN 'CM' THEN 3 WHEN 'C1' THEN 4 WHEN 'C2' THEN 5 WHEN 'F1' THEN 6 WHEN 'F2' THEN 7 WHEN 'F3' THEN 8 WHEN 'OK' THEN 9 ELSE 10 END, T.DEVICE_NM, CASE T.DEVICE_ALIAS WHEN 'LH' THEN 1 WHEN 'RH' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END )) WHERE ( #{pageStartNo} = '-1' OR RNUM > #{pageStartNo}) AND ( #{pageEndNo} = '-1' OR RNUM < #{pageEndNo})

SELECT Count(1) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, RTRIM(DEVICE_NM) || '-' || RTRIM(DEVICE_ALIAS) ||' [' || TRIM(DEVICE_ID) || ']' AS DEVICE, LINE_CD, TOTAL, (OK - REPAIR) AS OK, NG, NOSCAN, PASS, REPAIR, OK AS TOT_OK, TOT_NG, DECODE(TOTAL-PASS, 0, 0, TRUNC((OK) / (TOTAL - PASS) * 100, 2)) AS PASS_RATIO FROM ( SELECT T.PLANT_CD, T.DEVICE_ID, T.DEVICE_SERIAL, T.DEVICE_NM, T.DEVICE_ALIAS, B.CODE_NM AS LINE_CD, NVL(A.TOTAL_CNT, 0) AS TOTAL, NVL(A.OK_CNT, 0) AS OK, NVL(A.NG_CNT, 0) AS NG, NVL(A.PASS_CNT, 0) AS PASS, NVL(A.REPAIR_CNT, 0) AS REPAIR, NVL(A. NOSCAN_CNT, 0) AS NOSCAN, NVL((A.NG_CNT + A.NOSCAN_CNT), 0) AS TOT_NG FROM TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA T INNER JOIN C_COMM_CD B ON B.PLANT_CD = T.PLANT_CD AND B.CD_GRP = 'LINE_CD' AND B.CODE = T.LINE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PLANT_CD, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, WORK_DT, SUM(NVL(TOTAL_CNT, 0)) AS TOTAL_CNT, SUM(NVL(OK_CNT, 0)) AS OK_CNT, SUM(NVL(NG_CNT, 0)) AS NG_CNT, SUM(NVL(PASS_CNT, 0)) AS PASS_CNT, SUM(NVL(REPAIR_CNT, 0)) AS REPAIR_CNT, SUM(NVL(NOSCAN_CNT, 0)) AS NOSCAN_CNT FROM TIGHTENING_SUM_HI WHERE (#{shift} = '-1' OR SHIFT = #{shift}) GROUP BY PLANT_CD, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, WORK_DT ) A ON A.PLANT_CD = T.PLANT_CD AND A.DEVICE_ID = T.DEVICE_ID AND A.DEVICE_SERIAL = T.DEVICE_SERIAL AND A.WORK_DT = #{work_dt} WHERE T.PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},4) AND (#{device_id} = '-1' OR T.DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR T.DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND T.STN_GUB = 'N' AND (#{line_cd} = '-1' OR T.LINE_CD = #{line_cd}) ORDER BY T.PLANT_CD, CASE T.LINE_CD WHEN 'T1' THEN 1 WHEN 'T2' THEN 2 WHEN 'CM' THEN 3 WHEN 'C1' THEN 4 WHEN 'C2' THEN 5 WHEN 'F1' THEN 6 WHEN 'F2' THEN 7 WHEN 'F3' THEN 8 WHEN 'OK' THEN 9 ELSE 10 END, T.DEVICE_NM, CASE T.DEVICE_ALIAS WHEN 'LH' THEN 1 WHEN 'RH' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END ))

SELECT RNUM, PLANT_CD, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, DEVICE_NM, BODY_NO, MES_PBSOUT_PROD_DT, MES_PBSOUT_SEQ, SHIFT, TOT_BATCH_NUM, PASS_FLG, SCAN_FLG, TIGHTENING_RESULT, REPAIR_RESULT, LAST_UPDATE_DT, MES_TRANS_FLG, MES_TRANS_DT, REGDT, REG_USER_ID ,( SELECT WM_CONCAT (BATCH_NUM)BATCH_NUM FROM TIGHTENING_BATCH_INFO SUB WHERE TOT.PLANT_CD = SUB.PLANT_CD AND TOT.DEVICE_ID = SUB.DEVICE_ID AND TOT.DEVICE_SERIAL = SUB.DEVICE_SERIAL AND TOT.BODY_NO = SUB.BODY_NO GROUP BY PLANT_CD,BODY_NO,DEVICE_ID,DEVICE_SERIAL ) BATCH_NUM , ( SELECT WM_CONCAT (TOR_VALUE) TOR_VALUE FROM TIGHTENING_BATCH_INFO SUB WHERE TOT.PLANT_CD = SUB.PLANT_CD AND TOT.DEVICE_ID = SUB.DEVICE_ID AND TOT.DEVICE_SERIAL = SUB.DEVICE_SERIAL AND TOT.BODY_NO = SUB.BODY_NO GROUP BY PLANT_CD,BODY_NO,DEVICE_ID,DEVICE_SERIAL ) TOR_VALUE , ( SELECT WM_CONCAT (ANG_VALUE) TOR_VALUE FROM TIGHTENING_BATCH_INFO SUB WHERE TOT.PLANT_CD = SUB.PLANT_CD AND TOT.DEVICE_ID = SUB.DEVICE_ID AND TOT.DEVICE_SERIAL = SUB.DEVICE_SERIAL AND TOT.BODY_NO = SUB.BODY_NO GROUP BY PLANT_CD,BODY_NO,DEVICE_ID,DEVICE_SERIAL ) ANG_VALUE , ( SELECT WM_CONCAT (ANG_VALUE) TOR_VALUE FROM TIGHTENING_BATCH_INFO SUB WHERE TOT.PLANT_CD = SUB.PLANT_CD AND TOT.DEVICE_ID = SUB.DEVICE_ID AND TOT.DEVICE_SERIAL = SUB.DEVICE_SERIAL AND TOT.BODY_NO = SUB.BODY_NO GROUP BY PLANT_CD,BODY_NO,DEVICE_ID,DEVICE_SERIAL ) TEN_VALUE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.CODE_VALUE, M.DEVICE_NM, A.LAST_UPDATE_DT DESC) AS RNUM , M.PLANT_CD, M.DEVICE_ID, M.DEVICE_SERIAL , RTRIM(M.DEVICE_NM) || '-' || RTRIM(M.DEVICE_ALIAS) AS DEVICE_NM , A.BODY_NO , A.MES_PBSOUT_PROD_DT , A.MES_PBSOUT_SEQ , A.SHIFT , A.TOT_BATCH_NUM , A.PASS_FLG , A.SCAN_FLG , A.TIGHTENING_RESULT , A.REPAIR_RESULT , A.LAST_UPDATE_DT , A.MES_TRANS_FLG , A.MES_TRANS_DT , A.REG_DT || A.REG_TM REGDT , A.REG_USER_ID
FROM TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA M LEFT OUTER JOIN ${table_nm} A ON A.PLANT_CD = M.PLANT_CD AND A.DEVICE_ID = M.DEVICE_ID AND A.DEVICE_SERIAL = M.DEVICE_SERIAL LEFT OUTER JOIN C_COMM_CD B ON B.PLANT_CD = M.PLANT_CD AND B.CD_GRP = 'LINE_CD' AND B.CODE = M.LINE_CD WHERE M.PLANT_CD = #{plant_cd} AND A.LAST_UPDATE_DT >= #{from_dt} AND A.LAST_UPDATE_DT <= #{to_dt} AND (#{shift} = '-1' OR A.SHIFT = #{shift}) AND (#{seq} = '-1' OR A.MES_PBSOUT_SEQ = #{seq}) AND (#{car_type} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(A.BODY_NO, 1, 4)) LIKE '%' || #{car_type} || '%') AND (#{body_no} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(A.BODY_NO, 5, 6)) LIKE '%' || #{body_no} || '%') AND (#{tightening_result} = '-1' OR (A.TIGHTENING_RESULT = #{tightening_result} OR A.REPAIR_RESULT = #{tightening_result})) AND (#{scan_flg} = '-1' OR A.SCAN_FLG = #{scan_flg}) AND (#{pass_flg} = '-1' OR A.PASS_FLG = #{pass_flg}) ORDER BY B.CODE_VALUE, M.DEVICE_NM, A.LAST_UPDATE_DT DESC ) TOT WHERE (#{pageStartNo} = '-1' OR RNUM > #{pageStartNo}) AND (#{pageEndNo} = '-1' OR RNUM < #{pageEndNo})

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ${table_nm} M WHERE M.PLANT_CD = #{plant_cd} AND (#{device_id} = '-1' OR M.DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10) ) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR M.DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND M.LAST_UPDATE_DT >= #{from_dt} AND M.LAST_UPDATE_DT <= #{to_dt} AND (#{shift} = '-1' OR M.SHIFT = #{shift}) AND (#{seq} = '-1' OR M.MES_PBSOUT_SEQ = #{seq}) AND (#{car_type} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(M.BODY_NO, 1, 4)) LIKE '%' || #{car_type} || '%') AND (#{body_no} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(M.BODY_NO, 5, 6)) LIKE '%' || #{body_no} || '%') AND (#{tightening_result} = '-1' OR (M.TIGHTENING_RESULT = #{tightening_result} OR M.REPAIR_RESULT = #{tightening_result})) AND (#{scan_flg} = '-1' OR M.SCAN_FLG = #{scan_flg}) AND (#{pass_flg} = '-1' OR M.PASS_FLG = #{pass_flg})

SELECT NVL(MAX(TOT_BATCH_NUM) ,0) FROM ${table_nm} M WHERE M.PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},4) AND (#{device_id} = '-1' OR M.DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10) ) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR M.DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND SUBSTR(M.LAST_UPDATE_DT, 1, 8) >= #{from_dt} AND SUBSTR(M.LAST_UPDATE_DT, 1, 8) <= #{to_dt} AND (#{shift} = '-1' OR M.SHIFT = #{shift}) AND (#{seq} = '-1' OR M.MES_PBSOUT_SEQ = #{seq}) AND (#{car_type} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(M.BODY_NO, 1, 4)) LIKE '%' || #{car_type} || '%') AND (#{body_no} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(M.BODY_NO, 5, 6)) LIKE '%' || #{body_no} || '%') AND (#{tightening_result} = '-1' OR (M.TIGHTENING_RESULT = #{tightening_result} OR M.REPAIR_RESULT = #{tightening_result})) AND (#{scan_flg} = '-1' OR M.SCAN_FLG = #{scan_flg}) AND (#{pass_flg} = '-1' OR M.PASS_FLG = #{pass_flg})

SELECT RNUM , '[' || RTRIM(M.DEVICE_ID) || '-' || M.DEVICE_SERIAL || '] ' || RTRIM(A.DEVICE_NM) || '-' || RTRIM(A.DEVICE_ALIAS) AS DEVICE , M.BODY_NO , B.TOT_BATCH_NUM , M.BATCH_NUM, M.TIGHTEN_ID, M.MES_PBSOUT_SEQ, M.BATCH_TIGHTENING_RESULT , M.TOR_STATE, M.TOR_VALUE, M.ANG_STATE, M.ANG_VALUE , M.TIGHTENING_DT, M.REG_DT || M.REG_TM AS REGDT, M.REG_USER_ID FROM ( SELECT RNUM, PLANT_CD, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, BODY_NO, BATCH_NUM, TIGHTEN_ID FROM ( SELECT /*+index_ASC(TIGHTENING_BATCH_INFO_HI TEST2) */ ROWNUM AS RNUM, PLANT_CD, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, BODY_NO, BATCH_NUM, TIGHTEN_ID FROM ( SELECT M.PLANT_CD, M.DEVICE_ID, M.DEVICE_SERIAL, M.BODY_NO, M.BATCH_NUM, M.TIGHTEN_ID FROM ${table_nm3} M LEFT OUTER JOIN TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA A ON A.PLANT_CD = M.PLANT_CD AND A.DEVICE_ID = M.DEVICE_ID AND A.DEVICE_SERIAL = M.DEVICE_SERIAL LEFT OUTER JOIN ${table_nm4} B ON B.PLANT_CD= M.PLANT_CD AND B.DEVICE_ID = M.DEVICE_ID AND B.DEVICE_SERIAL = M.DEVICE_SERIAL AND B.BODY_NO = M.BODY_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN C_COMM_CD C ON C.PLANT_CD = A.PLANT_CD AND C.CD_GRP = 'LINE_CD' AND C.CODE = A.LINE_CD WHERE M.PLANT_CD = #{plant_cd} AND M.TIGHTENING_DT >= #{from_dt} AND M.TIGHTENING_DT <= #{to_dt} AND (#{device_id} = '-1' OR M.DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10) ) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR M.DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND (#{seq} = '-1' OR M.MES_PBSOUT_SEQ = #{seq}) AND (#{car_type} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(M.BODY_NO, 1, 4)) LIKE '%' || #{car_type} || '%') AND (#{body_no} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(M.BODY_NO, 5, 6)) LIKE '%' || #{body_no} || '%') AND (#{tightening_result} = '-1' OR M.BATCH_TIGHTENING_RESULT = #{tightening_result} ) ORDER BY C.CODE_VALUE, A.DEVICE_NM, M.TIGHTENING_DT ) WHERE #{pageEndNo} = '-1' OR ROWNUM < #{pageEndNo} ) WHERE (#{pageStartNo} = '-1' OR RNUM > #{pageStartNo}) ) TOT LEFT OUTER JOIN ${table_nm3} M ON M.PLANT_CD = TOT.PLANT_CD AND M.DEVICE_ID = TOT.DEVICE_ID AND M.DEVICE_SERIAL = TOT.DEVICE_SERIAL AND M.BODY_NO = TOT.BODY_NO AND M.BATCH_NUM = TOT.BATCH_NUM AND M.TIGHTEN_ID = TOT.TIGHTEN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA A ON A.PLANT_CD = M.PLANT_CD AND A.DEVICE_ID = M.DEVICE_ID AND A.DEVICE_SERIAL = M.DEVICE_SERIAL LEFT OUTER JOIN ${table_nm4} B ON B.PLANT_CD= M.PLANT_CD AND B.DEVICE_ID = M.DEVICE_ID AND B.DEVICE_SERIAL = M.DEVICE_SERIAL AND B.BODY_NO = M.BODY_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN C_COMM_CD C ON C.PLANT_CD = A.PLANT_CD AND C.CD_GRP = 'LINE_CD' AND C.CODE = A.LINE_CD

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ${table_nm3} M WHERE M.PLANT_CD = #{plant_cd} AND M.TIGHTENING_DT >= #{from_dt} AND M.TIGHTENING_DT <= #{to_dt} AND (#{device_id} = '-1' OR M.DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10) ) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR M.DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND (#{seq} = '-1' OR M.MES_PBSOUT_SEQ = #{seq}) AND (#{car_type} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(M.BODY_NO, 1, 4)) LIKE '%' || #{car_type} || '%') AND (#{body_no} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(M.BODY_NO, 5, 6)) LIKE '%' || #{body_no} || '%') AND (#{tightening_result} = '-1' OR M.BATCH_TIGHTENING_RESULT = #{tightening_result} )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DEVICE, WORK_DT, TOTAL_CNT, (OK_CNT - REPAIR_CNT) AS OK_CNT, NG_CNT, NOSCAN_CNT, PASS_CNT, REPAIR_CNT, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM PLC_INTERLOCK_HI WHERE PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},4) AND (#{device_id} = '-1' OR DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND INTERLOCK_FLG ='Y' AND INTERLOCK_DT = WORK_DT) AS INTERLOCK_CNT, OK_CNT AS TOTAL_OK, (NG_CNT + NOSCAN_CNT) AS TOTAL_NG, DECODE(TOTAL_CNT - PASS_CNT, 0, 0, TRUNC((OK_CNT) / (TOTAL_CNT - PASS_CNT) * 100, 2)) AS TOTAL_OK_RATIO, DECODE(TOTAL_CNT - PASS_CNT, 0, 0, TRUNC((NG_CNT) / (TOTAL_CNT - PASS_CNT) * 100, 2)) AS NG_RATIO, DECODE(TOTAL_CNT - PASS_CNT, 0, 0, TRUNC((NOSCAN_CNT) / (TOTAL_CNT - PASS_CNT) * 100, 2)) AS NOSCAN_RATIO FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN #{device_id} = '-1' THEN 'All Tools' ELSE (SELECT RTRIM(DEVICE_NM) || '-' || RTRIM(DEVICE_ALIAS) ||' [' || TRIM(DEVICE_ID) || ']' FROM TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA WHERE PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},4) AND (#{device_id} = '-1' OR DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial})) END AS DEVICE, WORK_DT, SUM(NVL(TOTAL_CNT, 0)) AS TOTAL_CNT, SUM(NVL(OK_CNT, 0)) AS OK_CNT, SUM(NVL(NG_CNT, 0)) AS NG_CNT, SUM(NVL(PASS_CNT, 0)) AS PASS_CNT, SUM(NVL(REPAIR_CNT, 0)) AS REPAIR_CNT, SUM(NVL(NOSCAN_CNT, 0)) AS NOSCAN_CNT FROM TIGHTENING_SUM_HI WHERE PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},1) AND (#{device_id} ='-1' OR DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND WORK_DT >= #{from_dt} AND WORK_DT <= #{to_dt} GROUP BY WORK_DT ORDER BY WORK_DT )) WHERE (#{pageStartNo} = '-1' OR RNUM > #{pageStartNo}) AND (#{pageEndNo} = '-1' OR RNUM < #{pageEndNo})

SELECT NVL(COUNT(COUNT(WORK_DT)), 0) AS CNT FROM TIGHTENING_SUM_HI WHERE PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},1) AND (#{device_id} ='-1' OR DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},10)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND WORK_DT >= #{from_dt} AND WORK_DT <= #{to_dt} GROUP BY WORK_DT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, (SELECT PGM_NM FROM TIGHTENING_PGM_MA WHERE PLANT_CD = A.PLANT_CD AND PGM_ID = A.PGM_ID AND PROC_ID = A.PROC_ID ) PROGRAM, (SELECT PROC_NM FROM TIGHTENING_PGM_MA WHERE PLANT_CD = A.PLANT_CD AND PGM_ID = A.PGM_ID AND PROC_ID = A.PROC_ID ) PROCESS, CYCLE_TEST_DT, CYCLE_TEST_HOUR, SHIFT, CAR_TYPE_GRP, (SELECT '['|| TRIM(DEVICE_ID) ||'] '|| TRIM(DEVICE_NM) || '-' || TRIM(DEVICE_ALIAS) FROM TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA WHERE DEVICE_ID = A.DEVICE_ID AND DEVICE_SERIAL = A.DEVICE_SERIAL ) DEVICE_ID, BODY_NO, MES_PBSOUT_SEQ, REPAIR_JOB_NUM, TOT_BATCH_NUM, BATCH_NUM, TIGHTEN_ID, BATCH_TIGHTENING_RESULT, TOR_STATE, TOR_VALUE, ANG_STATE, ANG_VALUE, REGDT, REG_USER_ID FROM ( SELECT PLANT_CD, PGM_ID, PROC_ID, CYCLE_TEST_DT, CYCLE_TEST_HOUR, SHIFT, CAR_TYPE_GRP, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, TOT_BATCH_NUM, CASE WHEN TOR_STATE != '1' AND BATCH_NUM != TOT_BATCH_NUM THEN TO_NUMBER(BATCH_NUM) + 1 ELSE TO_NUMBER(BATCH_NUM) END BATCH_NUM, BODY_NO, MES_PBSOUT_SEQ, REPAIR_JOB_NUM, TIGHTEN_ID, BATCH_TIGHTENING_RESULT, TOR_STATE, TOR_VALUE, ANG_STATE, ANG_VALUE, REG_DT || REG_TM REGDT, REG_USER_ID FROM CYCLE_TEST_HI WHERE PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},4) AND CYCLE_TEST_DT = #{work_dt} AND ( #{hh} = '-1' OR CYCLE_TEST_HOUR = #{hh} )
AND PGM_ID = RPAD(#{pgm_id},10)
AND PROC_ID = RPAD(#{proc_id},10)
AND (#{car_type} ='-1' OR CAR_TYPE_GRP = RPAD(#{car_type},4) ) AND (#{device_id} ='-1' OR DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},7)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial})
AND (#{txt_car_type} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(BODY_NO, 1, 4)) LIKE '%' || #{txt_car_type} || '%') AND (#{txt_body_no} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(BODY_NO, 5, 6)) LIKE '%' || #{txt_body_no} || '%') ORDER BY REG_DT || REG_TM DESC ) A ) WHERE (#{pageStartNo} = '-1' OR RNUM > #{pageStartNo}) AND (#{pageEndNo} = '-1' OR RNUM < #{pageEndNo})

SELECT count(1) FROM CYCLE_TEST_HI WHERE PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},4) AND CYCLE_TEST_DT = #{work_dt} AND ( #{hh} = '-1' OR CYCLE_TEST_HOUR = #{hh} )
AND PGM_ID = RPAD(#{pgm_id},10)
AND PROC_ID = RPAD(#{proc_id},10)
AND (#{car_type} ='-1' OR CAR_TYPE_GRP = RPAD(#{car_type},4) ) AND (#{device_id} ='-1' OR DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},7)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND (#{txt_car_type} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(BODY_NO, 1, 4)) LIKE '%' || #{txt_car_type} || '%') AND (#{txt_body_no} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(BODY_NO, 5, 6)) LIKE '%' || #{txt_body_no} || '%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, '[' || TRIM(DEVICE_ID) ||'-'|| DEVICE_SERIAL ||'] ' || (SELECT TRIM(DEVICE_NM) || '-' || TRIM(DEVICE_ALIAS) FROM TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA WHERE DEVICE_ID = A.DEVICE_ID AND DEVICE_SERIAL = A.DEVICE_SERIAL) DEVICE, INTERLOCK_DT, INTERLOCK_SEQ, INTERLOCK_FLG, BODY_NO, INTERLOCK_REASON, REGDT, REG_USER_ID FROM ( SELECT PLANT_CD, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, INTERLOCK_DT, INTERLOCK_SEQ, INTERLOCK_FLG, BODY_NO, INTERLOCK_REASON, REG_DT || REG_TM REGDT, REG_USER_ID FROM PLC_INTERLOCK_HI WHERE PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},4) AND INTERLOCK_DT = #{work_dt} AND (#{interlock_type} = '-1' OR INTERLOCK_FLG = #{interlock_type} ) AND (#{device_id} ='-1' OR DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},7)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND (#{txt_car_type} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(BODY_NO, 1, 4)) LIKE '%' || #{txt_car_type} || '%') AND (#{txt_body_no} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(BODY_NO, 5, 6)) LIKE '%' || #{txt_body_no} || '%') ORDER BY REG_DT || REG_TM DESC ) A ) WHERE (#{pageStartNo} = '-1' OR RNUM > #{pageStartNo}) AND (#{pageEndNo} = '-1' OR RNUM < #{pageEndNo})

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PLC_INTERLOCK_HI WHERE PLANT_CD = RPAD(#{plant_cd},4) AND INTERLOCK_DT = #{work_dt} AND (#{interlock_type} = '-1' OR INTERLOCK_FLG = #{interlock_type} ) AND (#{device_id} ='-1' OR DEVICE_ID = RPAD(#{device_id},7)) AND (#{device_serial} = '-1' OR DEVICE_SERIAL = #{device_serial}) AND (#{txt_car_type} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(BODY_NO, 1, 4)) LIKE '%' || #{txt_car_type} || '%') AND (#{txt_body_no} = '-1' OR RTRIM(SUBSTR(BODY_NO, 5, 6)) LIKE '%' || #{txt_body_no} || '%')
